original_title: Bad Habits & How to Change Them -1950s
overview: Habit Patterns - Breaking bad teen habits. How to wash, care for yourself, prepare & dress for the day. Be nice, be social and organised. 1950s teen social skills. Take a good look at yourself. Learn to listen!
tagline: Listen & Observe to Break Bad Behaviors
title: Bad Habits & How to Change Them -1950s
